Reviews.Title: Unsatisfied
Reviews.Author: Anran Wang
Reviews.Content: The laptop crashes every single time I used it. It's more like an old laptop than a brand new laptop.

Reviews.Title: wondreful item,...its working great i like it
Reviews.Author: Luu Hoa  C
Reviews.Content: i will recommande it to all my friends and to the others also ,would go for DELL nothing else thanks.

Reviews.Title: IMO win8 is an issue, but the laptop itself is ok for the money.
Reviews.Author: lienmeat
Reviews.Content: I bought it because it's cheap, and I don't want to spend a ton right now, so I knew what I was getting into when I purchased it.I'm fine with the 720p display, the so-so hardware like the integrated intel gpu, as I don't plan on needing anything better for my uses, for this price.Most of my problems with it revolve around windows 8.  I'd prefer windows 7.  Installing classic shell and configuring some other things helped some, but it's definitely not ideal.I upgraded to windows 8.1, and this caused more issues than it fixed for me.  Afterwards, the wifi would connect to my router, but it would tell me "The connection is limited", and it would take several minutes before I could browse normally.  Nothing was wrong with my router during this time, and I had 2 phones and another computer connected the whole time. This issue was eventually fixed by a new wireless driver.  The upgrade to 8.1 also uninstalled classic shell, put IE back on the task bar, changed the theme I had saved, and did quite a few other annoying things that I had to fix, AGAIN.Presently, I have a problem where every time I restart, windows tells me I don't have an antivirus program selected, even though I have selected my antivirus program EVERY TIME I start up.  It doesn't remember!The laptop, while seeming fine hardware wise (and works really well in ubuntu, btw 6 hrs battery life and quick) is frustrating on win8/8.1.  Constant problems.  Windows8 just isn't ready for prime time, still, even after 8.1, IMO.

Reviews.Title: As good as any laptop I've used!
Reviews.Author: Marilyn Chandler
Reviews.Content: The only reason I gave it 4 stars is because I had to hire a tech. person to get me online, etc.  It didn't seem to be an easy set up as advertised.  I do love the speed tho and the screen is nice.  I wish you would include at least Word and Excel on a machine of this ilk.

Reviews.Title: review
Reviews.Author: Victoria
Reviews.Content: windows 8 is completely different and is more difficult. The volume doesn't work. and dell support is terrible. For more information ask me again.

Reviews.Title: Rating is hard to really do because you have to have something to compare to
Reviews.Author: Pete Eide
Reviews.Content: First lap top that I have had a chance to use so it is hard to compare to anything elseworks well and now that I have everything working it seems to be fine.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Computer!!
Reviews.Author: heather
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a good computer that would be fast and have a lot of storage.  I got what  I was asking for and then some!  This computer is super fast and is easy to use after playing with it for a while.  The price was just right and it arrived within days of ordering it.

Reviews.Title: This deal could have been better if there were a bunch of common accessories with the Laptop.
Reviews.Author: Praveen
Reviews.Content: I remember purchasing a Laptop from a Dell Store and they had a Bag, a wireless mouse and a mousepad with the laptop which are kinda basic need.This might be a strategy to make ppl buy different products but worth bundling it with a concession of a few $.

Reviews.Title: windows 8 what else needs to be said.
Reviews.Author: john "PB" Hammond
Reviews.Content: Great computer if it weren't for windows 8. It is not for hard core games but for the average user good computer.

Reviews.Title: Windows 8 on a laptop is a big mistake
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The computer works well but Windows 8 is very hard to use because "charms" and such keep popping up with normal cursor motions. These can not be turned off and I am left with a computer that is hard to use for much of anything.
